title: Stolen Heiress
description:
Claiming that his son has died while away, Lord Gravello makes it appear that his daughter is now "the Heir to all [his] vast Revenues, and pester'd with more Suitors than the Grecian Queen, in the long Absence of her Lord. You'll have the Dons, Lords and Dukes swarm about your House like Bees." But the scheming does not go as planned in this comedy by one of the most successful female playwrights. - Summary by ToddHW

Cast list:
Governor of Palermo: Greg Giordano
Count Pirro, Nephew to the Governor: redrun
Gravello, a Sicilian Lord, Father to Lucasia: ToddHW
Larich, his Brother: HelloCentral
Lord Euphenes, an old Sicilian General: Algy Pug
Palante, Son to Euphenes, but unknown in Love with Lucasia: Beeswaxcandle
Clerimont, his Friend: David Purdy
Eugenio, Son to Gravello in Disguise under the Name of Irus: Inkell
Alphonso, formerly an Officer under Euphenes: Jim Locke
Francisco, in Love with Lavinia: Adrian Stephens
Sancho, a Pedant, bred at Salamanca, design'd by Larich, a Husband for Lavinia: Alan Mapstone
Tristram, his Man: Tomas Peter
Rosco, Servant to Count Gravello: Kjetil Collett
Lucasia, Daughter to Gravello, in Love with Palante: Dawn Sutton
Lavinia, Daughter to Larich, in Love with Francisco: Sonia
Laura, Woman to Lucasia: Rapunzelina
Servant: emrolgould
Officer: Sandra Schmit
Stage Directions: Availle
Editing: ToddHW
